column4: If you're in need of that level of security, you may want to try something other than a VPS.
Do you have reason to believe your provider would try to mess with your box?
its probably going to be hosting some forex related stuff for people in iran to use -- major target for governmental weiner types to think about trying to mess with i think :(

Ah, I see then. I suppose you could encrypt everything and do other basic securing of the system, but if the provider wants to do horrible things, they could get around your efforts. I would focus more on choice of provider than technical resolutions.
